name: 張文中
objective:
1. Introduction 數學基礎簡介
2. Transfer functions 轉換函數
3. Signal flow graph 訊號流程圖
4. Mathematical models 實際系統數學模式之求得
5. State space equations 狀態方程式
6. Stability analysis of linear systems 線性系統之穩定度分析
7. Time domain analysis 控制系統之時域分析
8. Root locus 根值軌跡圖
9. Frequency domain analysis 控制系統之頻域分析
10. Controller design in time and frequency domains 時域及頻域下之控制器設計
schedule:
1. Introduction to control systems
2. Dynamic models (I) 　
3. Dynamic models (II) 　
4. Dynamic response (I)
5. Dynamic response (II)
6. Dynamic response (III)
7. Midterm examinations (I) 　
8. Basic properties of feedback (I) 　
9. Basic properties of feedback (II)
10. Basic properties of feedback (III)
11. The root-locus design method (I)
12. Midterm examinations (II) 　
13. The root-locus design method (II)
14. The root-locus design method (III) 　
15. The frequency-response design method (I)
16. The frequency-response design method (II) 　
17. The frequency-response design method (III) and introduction to state space approach
18. Final examination
scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of class participation 10%, homework 15%, midterm 25%+25%, and final 25%.
